title: Custom AI Agent for Automated YAML Generation
problem: Manual YAML configuration for DevOps workflows is time-consuming, error-prone, and requires deep technical knowledge. Teams spend hours creating and validating configuration files.
solution: Developed agentic AI system that automatically generates and validates YAML configurations based on natural language requirements. The AI agent understands context, best practices, and can adapt to project-specific patterns.

title: AI-Powered Automated Data Processing
problem: Manual data processing operations are slow, labor-intensive, and prone to inconsistencies. Organizations struggle with data quality and processing bottlenecks that slow business operations.
solution: Built AI-powered automation system for accurate data input, validation, and formatting. The system learns from patterns, handles edge cases, and maintains data quality standards automatically.
